item.title: By: Michele Mizejewski
item.dc:creator: Michele Mizejewski
item.description: If there ever was a Library situation warranting the use of "quelle horreur!" this was it ;) I agree with Julia that it was great to see everyone come together, address things with a tiered approach, and follow through until all authentication was restored.
item.content:encoded: If there ever was a Library situation warranting the use of “quelle horreur!” this was it ðŸ˜‰ I agree with Julia that it was great to see everyone come together, address things with a tiered approach, and follow through until all authentication was restored.
